text: Stolen Kisses () is a 1968 French romantic comedy-drama movie directed by François Truffaut and starring Jean-Pierre Léaud, Claude Jade, Delphine Seyrig, Daniel Ceccaldi, Claire Duhamel, Michael Lonsdale, Serge Rousseau, Harry-Max, André Falcon, Catherine Lutz. It was nominated for an Academy Award and 1 Golden Globe in 1969. == Other websites == * * * Category:1968 romance movies Category:1960s romantic comedy movies Category:1968 romantic drama movies Category:1968 comedy-drama movies Category:French romance movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by François Truffaut
title: Stolen Kisses
